timeline.bodyText: In case of multiple table inputs, if one of them had this issue, the code will abandon the others? Perhaps it should just warn and move on to the next table config?
timeline.author: mayankshriv

timeline.bodyText: This method has become too big, may be factor out into smaller helper routines for better readability?
timeline.author: mayankshriv
mayankshriv

replies.bodyText: This is copied from pinot-ingestion-common module, I would keep it the same way and maybe later on merge them.
replies.author: xiangfu0

timeline.bodyText: Does this class need to be JSON deserialized? If so, would be good to add annotations to gracefully handle name changes, new or missing member variables etc.

replies.author: xiangfu0

timeline.bodyText:
Consider refactor into smaller utility routines.
Also, Return type Object seems a bit unsettling for an api. But that's outside the scope of this PR.
timeline.author: mayankshriv

timeline.bodyText: Should generation and push be decoupled into separate sub-tasks?
timeline.author: mayankshriv

replies.bodyText: i feel it should be combined as build and push. otherwise we need to let minion segment generation job submit a push job?
replies.author: xiangfu0
